meanings.sent1: The groined ceiling of the old cathedral created a unique architectural style.
meanings.sent2: The groined arches in the building added a touch of elegance to the design.
meanings.sent3: The groined corners of the room made it look like a cozy nook.
meanings.sent4: Her groined smile revealed a mischievous secret.
meanings.sent5: The groined pattern on the fabric was intricate and beautiful.

meanings.sent1: The groined structure of the bridge made it sturdy and reliable.
meanings.sent2: The groined walls of the castle were a testament to its strength.
meanings.sent3: The groined pathway through the garden was a delightful surprise.
meanings.sent4: His groined hands held onto the railing tightly.
meanings.sent5: The groined roof of the house provided excellent protection from the rain.

meanings.sent1: The architect groined the hallways to enhance the building's aesthetics.
meanings.sent2: She groined the room with decorative moldings to give it a classic look.
meanings.sent3: He groined the garden with colorful flowers for a festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: They groined the entrance with intricate carvings to welcome guests in style.
meanings.sent5: The artist groined the canvas with bold strokes of paint for a striking effect.
